Package neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.heatexchanger

Class HeatExchangerSizingResult

java.lang.Object
neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.heatexchanger.HeatExchangerSizingResult
public final class HeatExchangerSizingResult extends Object
Result structure capturing calculated geometry and performance indicators for a candidate heat exchanger type.
